department: Public Service and Canada Appliction Portfolio(PACAP)
short_summary: One (1) Medical Mobile Treatment Centre (MTC) Insert to be used on a 2023 Dodge RAM Big Horn 3500 Crew Cab with long box (Base model D28H92) for delivery to Lower Sackville, Nova Scotia.
description: The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) has a requirement for one (1) Medical Mobile Treatment Centre (MTC) Insert to be used on a 2023 Dodge RAM Big Horn 3500 Crew Cab with long box (Base model D28H92) for delivery to Lower Sackville, Nova Scotia.",
